blueprint.description: Provide a JAAS login module for the University of Melbourne "centaur" central authentication LDAP service.

jaas:config.name: apromore
jaas:config.jaas:module: connection.url = ldaps://centaur.unimelb.edu.au user.base.dn = ou=people,o=unimelb user.filter = (uid=%u) user.search.subtree = true role.base.dn = ou=people,o=unimelb role.filter = (member:=uid=%u) role.name.attribute = cn role.search.subtree = true authentication = simple ssl.protocol = SSL
